description: If you don't need something that drills down into every folder and produces charts/graphs of the space utilization, then this is the tol for you. I simply wanna know which top folders contain the files hogging all my storage, and this does just that!
summary: very simple and straighforward to use

description: Helped me identify some 50 GBs to free in minutes. Easy to use, and for people that love keyboard shortcuts the tool to use.
